job_description:
Join us as a Technical Support Intern to support the team in handling customer issues and technical coordination. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Logging and documenting customer complaints, managing data, and preparing basic reports.
2. Assisting in complaint classification, technical investigation, and coordination with internal teams.
3. Supporting customer communication (supervised) and providing general administrative help.

This position is ideal for graduates interested in technical support, customer service, and problem-solving in a real work environment.
